title: Verify addition of Contact Officers list for Hajj Affairs Offices based on provided Excel sheet

steps.step: Access the platform and navigate to the Contact Officers section for Hajj Affairs Offices
steps.expected: Contact Officers list is not available as per the provided Excel sheet

expected_result: Contact Officers list for Hajj Affairs Offices should be added based on the provided Excel sheet

title: Verify platform name display issue when switching to English language

steps.step: Change the platform language to English
steps.expected: Platform name displays as 'Creative Awards' instead of 'Labbitom Award'

expected_result: Platform name should display correctly as 'Labbitom Award' when in English language

title: Verify accessibility of contact link for Hajj companies outside the Kingdom

steps.step: Check if the contact link is available for Hajj companies outside the Kingdom
steps.expected: Contact link should be accessible for Hajj companies outside the Kingdom

expected_result: Contact link should be accessible for Hajj companies outside the Kingdom

title: Verify addition of contact numbers related to country code for Contact Officers

steps.step: Find the option to add contact numbers and country code for Contact Officers
steps.expected: Ability to add contact numbers with country code should be present for Contact Officers

expected_result: Users should be able to add contact numbers with respective country codes for Contact Officers
